data.text:
Tag: Cricket

Sri Lanka Cricket Announces T20 World Cup Squad Amid Social Media Speculation

Subscribe to our WhatsApp Channel In the lead-up to the much-anticipated T20 World Cup, Sri Lanka Cricket (SLC) has officially unveiled its squad of 15 players, along with four travelling reserves. The announcement comes after a flurry of speculation and misleading information circulated on social media platforms in the days preceding the official declaration. The […]

Continue Reading

West Indian Cricketer Rovman Powell Did NOT Hit Six Sixes in One Over!

Subscribe to our WhatsApp Channel Cricket holds a significant place in Sri Lanka, being one of the most beloved sports in the country. Social media platforms buzz with discussions, updates, and analyses surrounding cricket matches, reflecting the fervent passion of the populace. However, amidst the genuine enthusiasm, there’s a growing concern regarding the dissemination of […]

Continue Reading

The Curious Case of Tom Merilaht: Unraveling the Mystery Behind a Bizarre Cricket Dismissal!

Cricket, renowned for its inherent unpredictability, occasionally gets highlighted for bizarre umpiring blunders. In this sport, where split-second judgments can sway the course of a match, the reliability of umpires’ decisions is paramount. A recent viral video featured such a strange, umpiring decision that baffled many. Viral Social Media Posts This investigation aims to delve […]

Continue Reading

Is Rohit Sharma Going to Retire from All Forms of Cricket? Let’s Find Out the Facts…

With the defeat in the ODI World Cup final match on home soil, social media was flooded with posts about the Indian cricket team. Many such posts are misleading. This is our investigation related to one such post about the captain of the current Indian ODI & Test Cricket team, Rohit Sharma. Social Media Posts […]

Continue Reading

The Woman Accompanying Dhanushka to Court is NOT his lawyer!

While the case against cricketer Dhanushka Gunathilake for alleged sexual assault in Australia drew much attention, there was a lot of curiosity on social media about the young woman who accompanied the cricketer as well. We decided to investigate the accuracy of viral claims suggesting that the woman might be Dhanushka’s legal representative. Social Media […]

Continue Reading

The person in the viral image with Virat Kohli is Ashish Nehra, a Cricket coach, and former cricketer

Rishi Sunak became the first Indian-origin politician to lead the United Kingdom after Penny Mordaunt pulled out of the Conservative Party leadership race. He was elected as the first British Asian Prime Minister in over 200 years, as well as the youngest. Sunak’s both parents are of Indian descent. His parents migrated from East Africa […]

Continue Reading

A Die-hard Fan of David Miller passes away, gets shared as his own daughter!

Viral posts of cricket fans around the world mourning over the death of South African batsman David Miller’s daughter went viral since last night (October 8th ). These posts originated following an Instagram post by Miller himself and few of the mainstream international media had also reported this as the death of Miller’s own daughter. […]

Continue Reading

Burj Khalifa was NOT lit up with Sri Lankan national Flag after the Asian Cup Victory!

Sri Lanka, a nation battered by the ongoing economic crisis, burst into spontaneous celebrations last night, as the cricket team from the island nation made one of the most dramatic comebacks in recent history to lift the Asia Cup 2022 for the sixth time, by beating a more fancied Pakistani team. Social media was flooded […]
